name: Brave Path (itch)
description:
Brave Path is a short classical turn-based roguelike with crafting.

You take the role of a demon hunter whose mission is to rid the kingdom of powerful demons each of which has a unique power and only you can unravel their secrets that would wipe them off the face of the earth!

Explore procedural generated dungeons with dangerous traps, find loots, reveal secrets, craft epic weapons, open new characters and defeat ancient bosses!

Features

  • Free class system.
  • Crafting.
  • Weapon-component system.
  • Procedural level generation.
  • Permadeath.

The game is still in development and new features will be added.
If you have suggestions please write them below.
This version is early alpha and it may have some bugs.

Planned Features

  • Sounds and Music.  Done
  • More bosses, levels, items.
  • Archer and Mage mechanics.
  • Alchemy.
  • New characters  Done
